item.title: Outrage in Australia After American Woman Grabs a Baby Wombat
item.description: A video of the online influencer snatching the joey from the side of its mother drew calls for her to be deported. She left the country Friday.

item.title: Kremlin Says Putin Met With Trump’s Envoy, Steve Witkoff
item.description: The talks in Moscow with Steve Witkoff indicated that Russia was keen to keep negotiating with the United States over Ukraine.
